Package scs3grp5.entity

Class CampMembershipDatabase

java.lang.Object
scs3grp5.entity.CampMembershipDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CampMembershipDatabase extends Object implements Serializable
Handles the all relationships (CampMembership) between all Students and all Camps. For querying Camp memberships details (i.e. role in camp, blacklists)
Since:
2023-11-26

    • getCampWithCampCommMember

      public Camp getCampWithCampCommMember(Student student)
      Find the Camp that this Student is a CampCommittee of (there should only be 1 active camp). Defaults to being with respect to the system's "Today" date
      Parameters:
      student - The specified student
      Returns:
      The camp that the student is currently a Camp Committee of
      See Also:
      • getCampWithCampCommMember(Student, Date)

    • getCampWithCampCommMember

      Find the Camp that this Student is a CampCommittee of (there should only be 1 active camp).
      Parameters:
      student - The specified student
      today - Camps that ended before this date will not be considered
      Returns:
      The camp that the student is currently a Camp Committee of

      public boolean removeParticipant(Student student, Camp camp)
      Removes Participant from Camp and add them into the Blacklist
      Parameters:
      student - The participant to remove
      camp - The camp to remove the participant from
      Returns:
      Whether the removal was successful (unsuccessful if Student is a Camp Committee member)

    • getRoleInCamp

      public CampRole getRoleInCamp(Camp camp, Student student)
      Get role of a Student in a Camp
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp to search the student in
      student - The student to search for
      Returns:

      Get role of a Student in a Camp
      Parameters:
      campID - The ID of the camp to search the student in
      studentID - The ID of the student to search for
      Returns:
      Role of student in a camp. If camp doesn't exists or student not a member of the camp, then null
